channel.title: Query Runner for NewRelic Events and Metrics
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
I really like `redash` and have been playing around for couple of days. Few things which I think I am missing are data sources mainly `NewRelic` and `OpsGenie`.
I am thinking to start working the query runner for NewRelic using GraphQL with very basic feature set.
I was going through the documentation `http://discuss.redash.io/t/creating-a-new-query-runner-data-source-in-redash/347` which is over 5 years old. I would like to know if there is any updated document on how to create query runner will definitely help a lot.
If any of those query runner are in line for development, may be I can start working on those in parallel and get them prioritized.
Regards, Mudasir Mirza.

item.title: Query Runner for NewRelic Events and Metrics
item.dc:creator: mudasirmirza
item.description:
Hi everyone,

I really like redash and have been playing around for couple of days. Few things which I think I am missing are data sources mainly NewRelic and OpsGenie.

I am thinking to start working the query runner for NewRelic using GraphQL with very basic feature set.

I was going through the documentation http://discuss.redash.io/t/creating-a-new-query-runner-data-source-in-redash/347 which is over 5 years old. I would like to know if there is any updated document on how to create query runner will definitely help a lot.

If any of those query runner are in line for development, may be I can start working on those in parallel and get them prioritized.

Regards,
Mudasir Mirza.
